attributes.action: Allow Nigel Farage the leader of UKIP into the brexit discussions 4mil voters
attributes.background: I think it is the duty of parliament to allow the leader of United Kingdom Independence Party  Nigel Farage to take part in the forth coming discussions on leaving the EU. I think it is undemocratic to prevent the leader of a party of at least 4000000 voters not be allowed to join in.
